text: Area 2 of Tungku Landless Indigenous Citizens' Housing Scheme () is a village administrative division in Brunei-Muara District, Brunei. It is a subdivision under the mukim or subdistrict of Gadong 'A'. The area comprises a public housing cluster of Landless Indigenous Citizens' Housing Scheme, a government housing programme. Its community is headed by a or village head and the incumbent is Pengiran Hamzah bin Pengiran Matali. Tungku is also a designated postcode area with the postcode BE2719. == Geography == As a village subdivision, the area is surrounded by Tungku to the north, south and west, and Rimba Landless Indigenous Citizens' Housing Scheme to the east. The populated area is part of Tungku settlement, one of the populated places on the outskirts of Bandar Seri Begawan, the capital of Brunei. == See also == * Tungku Landless Indigenous Citizens' Housing Scheme Area 1 * Tungku Landless Indigenous Citizens' Housing Scheme Area 3 * Tungku (village) == References == Category:Villages of Brunei
title: Tungku Landless Indigenous Citizens' Housing Scheme Area 2
